author: Reuters Editorial
title: HiVi Acoustics Technology to pay A shares div for FY 2017 on May 11
text:
May 3 (Reuters) - HiVi Acoustics Technology Co Ltd :
* Says it will pay cash dividend of 2 yuan(before tax)/10 shares and use additional paid-in capital to distribute 5 new shares for every 10 shares for 2017 to shareholders of record on May 10
* The companyâ€™s shares will be traded ex-right and ex-dividend on May 11 and the dividend will be paid on May 11
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/xhfZ5D
 (Beijing Headline News)
